creditline: Gift of Various Donors, by exchange
description: white ground; long spout; large base; transfer decoration of Darlington Town Hall on one side; pastoral landscape with cottage and slumped figure carrying a pack on other side
inscription: \"DARLINGTON TOWN HALL Erected 1808/Sold at Bland\'s China Shop Darlington\", in brown, below building
title: "Darlington Town Hall" pitcher
